text: Thomas Hardwick (1752–1829) was an English architect. Thomas Hardwick may also refer to: * Thomas Hardwick Sr. (1725–1798), English master mason and architect * Thomas W. Hardwick (1872–1944), American politician * Thomas Hardwicke (1756–1835), British soldier and naturalist ==See also== * Hardwick (disambiguation)
title: Thomas Hardwick (disambiguation)
